A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is unpredictable. Rian Johnson makes ballsy moves with this film. Some of these choices deliver and satisfy\, some don't and raise questions and conflict. Nevertheless\, the cast gives strong perfrormances in their roles (though I did not like Benecio del Toro's performance). Everyone involved gives 110% and it clearly shows. Despite some pacing issues\, The Last Jedi is entertaining as hell. Rian Johnson makes his mark on Star Wars history.
